Open Products Facts is an open database of more than %1$d products (plus the ones you will contribute).
Open Products Facts is an open database of all products in the world.
Contribute to product transparency
Scan products, take them in picture, make product transparency happen
Get the facts
Extensive information about the products you\'ve scanned, deciphered for you
Keep track of the product you use
All the products you scanned, in one handy list you can export
Works offline
You can add new products, even if you don\'t have an Internet connection right now
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Open Products Facts. Please add it.
The product you scanned does already exist in Open Products Facts.
Look at this product on Open Products Facts :
Books are not currently supported by Open Products Facts
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Products Facts
Click here to donate to Open Products Facts
Help translate Open Products Facts
Bring the Open Products Facts database to your language - no technical knowledge required
Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Products Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Products Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
